ygData.subject: RE: Trading Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Mithril Breastplate = hella good Mithril Greaves = hella good Mithril Vambraces = hella good Mithril Bracers = ok.  great for wisdom using casters.  great
ygData.messageBody:
Mithril Breastplate = hella good
Mithril Greaves = hella good
Mithril Vambraces = hella good
Mithril Bracers = ok. great for wisdom using casters. great trade item
Runed Mithril Tunic = good for wisdom using casters. ok trade item


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard, Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Illian [mailto:jeff@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 11:10 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Trading Advice


From: "Jeff Illian" <jeff@...>

Last night a high level wizard starting offering me a ton of mithril stuff
in trade for my lambent. Having never seen a piece of mithril before in my
life, I haven't the slightest whether or not this is a good trade or not.
Anyone got any advice on the break down between mithril and lambent? He was
offering multiple mithril pieces per one lambent piece.

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 35th song
Prexu

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
